<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for(Iterator<DataSnapshot> it = dataSnapshot.getChildren().iterator(); it.hasNext(); ){
String column = it.next().getKey();
String value = it.next().getValue(String.class);
names.add(column + " " + value);
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can extract the common string left to the '=' sign by using the getKey() method on the iterator and then concatenate it with the value of the iterator.next().getValue(String.class) method to create the final string for the column and value.
